title: UPDATE: 6-Year-Old Killed In North Side Shooting Identified
content:
ST. LOUIS (KMOX) – A 6-year-old is dead after a shooting in north St. Louis.
It happened around 7:30 Wednesday night on West Florissant Avenue.
Witnesses say Marcus Johnson Jr., of Glasgow Village, was struck in the chest during a drive-by shooting in the 4500 block of West Florissant. The 6-year-old was taken to a hospital but later died.
According to police reports, the suspect pulled alongside the family’s minivan and opened fire. St. Louis Police are looking for a dark-colored sedan in connection with this shooting.
A 15-year-old male and a 69-year-old male in the vehicle with Johnson were also hit by gunfire, but their injuries are not life-threatening.
Police say another passenger grabbed a gun and returned fire.
It’s not known if anyone in the suspect’s car was hit.
Police are actively investigating the murder.
